content: **free pattern download w oolplace is in german only ** / in filati pocket 11 - jacke twinset top # 08 top mit kreuzstäbchen und stäbchen 1 -------- **maschenproben/gauge** - 10 cm x 10 cm 20 5 m x 12 r = stäbchen 20 5 m x 8 75 r = kruzstäbchen-muster **material** 300 350 400 g lana grossa natural knits summer cashmere creme col 2 6 perlmuttknöpfe/mother of pearl buttons in natur ø 18 mm ---- for photos and information from lana grossa see https //www lana-grossa de/modelle/detail/jacke-mit-kreuzstaebchen-und-staebchen-summer-cashmere/9261001_m7/ 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/-08-top-mit-kreuzstabchen-und-stabchen
